https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2WIjsQDq25SKvE9GVW8o5iZt4Vd.jpg Three women take a road trip to Santa Barbara in order to deliver the ashes of one of their dead husbands to his resentful daughter. Faced with the decision of a lifetime, Arvilla Holden hijacks her two best friends and sets off in a vintage '66 Bonneville convertible. Bonneville
